name: ebullition
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the state or act of boiling: The ebullition ceased, and the compound changed to a dark purple.
[ C ] a sudden strong expression of an emotion: ebullitions of temper/rage a sudden ebullition of passion
